title: Meguridokoro
description:
1-5. Meguridokoro
6. Kawaii Imouto (A Lovely Sister)
7. Idol Drops
8. Haijin-kei Kanojo (Game Addict Girlfriend)
9. Darashi Ane na
10. Meguridokoro

In the raws for the tankobon Chapters Meguridokoro 1.5 became chapter 2 and each chapter afterwards was bumped up by 1. Chapter names are not wrong there was simply a change between the individual releases of the chapters and the tankobon that was eventually released.
